author: Special Correspondent
text:
A CD on short films on “Gandhian philosophy” brought out by the Gandhi World Foundation was released at a function held at Sivapuram near here on Saturday.

The short films aimed at disseminate the principles of Mahatma Gandhi. Fight against alcohol, conservation of ecology, and health education awareness are some of the key issues addressed in the compact disc.

Releasing the disc, D. Parmala Devi, Dean of Medical College and Hospital, said that obesity was a common problem among the present-day children and youths. She advised that some physical work would go a long way in resolving the issue for keeping fit.

K.H. Salim , Adviser to the Foundation, in his inaugural address, spoke on the objective of the programme. K. Mohanraj, president of Foundation and V.C. Subash Gandhi, its secretary the short films would also focus on keeping the villages clean and hygienic.

K.R. Ramanarthan, former Joint Director of Health and Rural Services received the first disc.
title: Short film on health care, Gandhian principles released
